description: portraits of two men; Horatio Gentileschi in an oval frame on a pedestal facing right and looking out; left hand on chest; Edward Mascall portrait leaning against pedestal below and left of Gentileschi; man facing left looking out wearing cloak with high white collar
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate around frames: [p.241/ HORATIO GENTILESCHI/ EDWARD MASCALL]; on sheet below image in black: [T. Chambars sculp]; in pencil: [1-463]
title: Portraits of Horatio Gentileschi / Edward Mascall
